rows.label: fev08_090_175_msg0002
rows.name: Yes, I think that would be wise...

rows.label: fev08_090_175_msg0003
rows.name:
While I'm eager to reunite with
Meleph-sama as quickly as possible,
we mustn't risk overexertion.

rows.label: fev08_090_175_msg0004
rows.name:
Rex is our only Driver now,
so very important Rex rest properly!

rows.label: fev08_090_175_msg0006
rows.name:
But yeah, you're right.
We need to play it safe right now...

rows.label: fev08_090_175_msg0007
rows.name:
Shin...
Do you think this area is safe?

rows.label: fev08_090_175_msg0008
rows.name:
Yes...
I don't sense any enemy presence.

rows.label: fev08_090_175_msg0009
rows.name: Then let's take a break here.
